name: Christopher_Knight_Home_Canterbury_3-piece_Fabric_Sectional_Sofa_Set
reviews: Unfortunately, the seats were very shallow and too firm. The measurements for the depth are right on the description so that's probably my fault....but, sometimes, you have to see it to know for sure. I didn't want to take the trouble to box it and send it back so I just sold it at a discounted price to my neighbors.

Couch arrived within 7 days of ordering. Easy to assemble. This is a small sectional which is exactly what I needed for my space and not very easy to find. So I'm very pleased with this couch for the price.
Very pleased with sectional. I bought it for my daughter apartment. Love the fabric, color and size. Great quality for the price.
description:
The Christopher Knight Home Canterbury fabric sectional sofa set
will warm up the look of any living room, sitting room, or even
your media room. Includes: One (1) three-seat sofa, one (1) chaise lounge, and
  one (1) ottomanMaterial: Polyester fabric, plywood, larch woodColor options: Charcoal or chocolateFinish: EspressoAssembly required: YesThree-seat sofa dimensions: 33 inches high x 70 inches wide x
  30.75 inches deepThree-seat sofa weight: 86-poundsChaise lounge dimensions: 33 inches high x 70 inches wide x
  30.75 inches deepChaise lounge weight: 86-poundsOttoman dimensions: 19 inches high x 30.75 inches wide x
  25.50 inches deepOttoman weight: 28-poundsFurniture Pattern: SolidProduct Features: Ottoman IncludedMaterial: Fabric, Polyester, WoodStyle: Contemporary, Casual, ModernAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: Charcoal, ChocolateColor: Grey, BrownStyleCasual, Contemporary, ModernMaterialFabric, Polyester, WoodAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown, GreyFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesOttoman Included
